item.title: Getting started with cron
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting cron set up or installed. Run a cron every minuite # Edit crontab using command crontab -e Add this line to the end of file. * * * * * /fullpath/mycron Exit Verify by command crontab -l
